content: Back in NYC after Japan, and the city's got a new vibe. Planning a rooftop BBQ to mix zen with the urban jungle. Here's to new perspectives and old friends.
raw_content: Just moved back to NYC after my Japan adventure. The city's energy hits different now—feels like I'm seeing it through a new lens. Already planned my first social event: a rooftop BBQ with friends from the old block. Here's to blending the calm of Japan with the chaos of NYC, one bite at a time. 🍔🌆

content: Just turned 22 and diving into AI & ML for finance. Today, I wrestled with real-time market data to test a model I've been tweaking. It's like teaching calculus to a dog, but I'm making progress. Here's to blending numbers and algorithms into a career masterpiece!
raw_content: Just turned 22 and diving into AI & ML for finance. Today, got my hands on some real-time market data to test a model I've been tweaking. It's like trying to teach a dog calculus, but somehow, I'm making progress. Here's to blending numbers and algorithms into a career masterpiece! 🎂📈
